# tf.sysconfig.get_include

Get the directory containing the TensorFlow C++ header files.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/sysconfig/get_include"><code>tf.compat.v1.sysconfig.get_include</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/sysconfig/get_include"><code>tf.compat.v2.sysconfig.get_include</code></a>


``` python
tf.sysconfig.get_include()
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Returns:

The directory as string.
